info.description:
The purpose of this service is to provide an application
that is using plain go code to define an API
info.title: HTTP API.

get.description:
List apps
This will returns a list of apps

post.description:
Add a new app
This will create a new appss

get.description:
List apps
This will returns a list of apps

List app db schema
This will returns a list of app db schema

Add a new app database
This will create a new apps database

This will returns a list of app db schema detail

delete.description:
Delete the app schema

parameters.name: app

parameters.name: app

This will reset the app user password

delete.description:
Delete the app
This will delete the app

parameters.name: id

put.description:
Update the app arch requests
This will update the app arch requests

Update the app image
This will update the app image

Update the app resources requests
This will update the app resources requests

Update the app state
This will update the app state
put.summary: 更改服务状态，启动或停止

put.description:
rebuild the app  unit
This will rebuild the app unit

recovery the app  unit

This will update the app unit state
